# GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/appPriceSchedule | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/appPriceSchedule ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-apppriceschedule)

-  GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/appPriceSchedule 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/appPriceSchedule

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-apppriceschedule#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/apps/{id}/relationships/appPriceSchedule
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-apppriceschedule#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Response Codes](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-apppriceschedule#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppAppPriceScheduleLinkageResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appapppriceschedulelinkageresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-apppriceschedule#see-also)

### [Getting and managing an appâ€™s price schedules](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-apppriceschedule#Getting-and-managing-an-apps-price-schedules)

[`Read price schedule information for an app`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apps-_id_-apppriceschedule)Read price schedule details for a specific app.[`Read an app's price schedule information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apppriceschedules-_id_)List the price schedule details for a specific app.[`List automatically generated prices for an app`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apppriceschedules-_id_-automaticprices)List the automatically calculated prices for an app generated from a base territory.[`Read the base territory for an app's price schedule`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apppriceschedules-_id_-baseterritory)Read the base territory and currency for a specific app.[`List manually chosen prices for an app`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apppriceschedules-_id_-manualprices)List the prices you chose for a specific app.[`GET /v1/appPriceSchedules/{id}/relationships/automaticPrices`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apppriceschedules-_id_-relationships-automaticprices)[`GET /v1/appPriceSchedules/{id}/relationships/baseTerritory`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apppriceschedules-_id_-relationships-baseterritory)[`GET /v1/appPriceSchedules/{id}/relationships/manualPrices`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-apppriceschedules-_id_-relationships-manualprices)[`Add a scheduled price change to an app`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v1-apppriceschedules)Create a scheduled price change for an app.
